T02D2858:197a-1: sim ha n'a da s'a dha nam /
T02D2858:197a-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2858:197a-5: dang por re zhig sngags pas kha bshal pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2858:197a-6: stan pa de ba la 'dug nas /
T02D2858:197a-7: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge hr'i: dkar po bltas te /
T02D2858:197a-8: de'i 'od kyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2858:197b-0: chub sems dpa' @197b rnams spyan drangs te mdun du
T02D2858:197b-1: bsams la / de'i rjes la mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs byas te /
T02D2858:197b-2: stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2858:197b-3: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2858:197b-4: zhes pa 'dis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2858:197b-5: de nas skad cig gis pam gyur pa las padma
T02D2858:197b-6: dkar po de'i steng du yi ge sim yongs su
T02D2858:197b-7: gyur pa las seng ge dkar po de'i steng du
T02D2858:197b-8: zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i: las yang
T02D2858:197b-9: dag par byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge
T02D2858:197b-10: sgrar bdag nyid bsam par bya /
T02D2858:197b-11: dkar po 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan dang
T02D2858:197b-12: ral pa'i thor cog can spyan gsum pa phyag gnyis
T02D2858:197b-13: pa dka' thub pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2858:197b-14: rgyal po chen po'i 'gying bag gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2858:197b-15: phyag gnyis pa'i g-yon pa na padma gyen du langs pa'i thog na ral gri 'bar ba /
T02D2858:197b-16: g-yas na rtse gsum dkar po sprul gyis bcings pa /
T02D2858:197b-17: yang g-yon ngos su dri bzangs sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa dkar po /
T02D2858:197b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba sprul pa'i sku chen por bsam par bya'o //
T02D2858:197b-20: aom a'a: hr'i:sim ha n'a da h'um phat /
T02D2858:197b-21: de'i rjes sa gzungs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2858:197b-22: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2858:197b-23: na ma:aa ry'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02D2858:197b-26: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D2858:197b-27: tadya th'a/ aom aa ka te /
T02D2858:197b-34: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang
T02D2858:197b-35: phyug gi spyan sngar snga dro'i dus su ba'i lci
T02D2858:197b-36: ba sa lam lhung bas mandal brgyad byas la mandal
T02D2858:197b-37: re re la yang lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o
T02D2858:197b-38: // de nas lci ba lhag ma la sngags lan bdun bzlas la byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2858:197b-39: nang gang du byung ba'i sar bskus na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2858:197b-40: nyi ma bdun nam bcu gsum mam nyi shu rtsa
T02D2858:197b-41: gcig byas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yin
T02D2858:197b-42: du zin kyang grub par ma gyur na ngas mtshams
T02D2858:197b-43: med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2858:197b-44: rje btsun seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2858:197b-45: slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
